timeline.author: wirtsleg
wirtsleg

timeline.bodyText:
This test has a lot of strange logic.

Fills cache with unique and non-unique elements without any reason
Checks for saving without id

In my opinion, it should just check repository bean is not null and do 1 put, 1 get (just in case).
timeline.author: wirtsleg
